sourcesContent:
<template>
  <nav>
    <router-link :to="{name: 'Home'}">Home</router-link> |
    <router-link :to="{name: 'AllData'}">All Data</router-link> |
    <router-link :to="{name: 'Recordings'}">Recordings</router-link>
  </nav>

  <section class="app-main">
    <router-view v-slot="{ Component, route }">
      <component :is="Component" name="Home" />
    </router-view>
  </section>

</template>

<script>
import {provide} from "vue";
import getMqttClient from "@/composables/getMqttClient";
import Home from "@/views/Home";

export default {
  components: {Home},
  setup() {
    let mqttClient = getMqttClient()
    provide('mqttClient', mqttClient) //provide the client to components that need it (import via inject(key)
  },
}
</script>

<style>
#app {
  font-family: Avenir, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
  text-align: center;
  color: #2c3e50;
}

nav {
  padding: 30px;
}

nav a {
  font-weight: bold;
  color: #2c3e50;
}

nav a.router-link-exact-active {
  color: #42b983;
}
</style>
